creator: david_syer@hotmail.com
text:
$ jar -tvf ~/.m2/repository/org/apache/tomcat/tomcat-servlet-api/7.0.0-SNAPSHOT/tomcat-servlet-api-7.0.0-SNAPSHOT-sources.jar 
     0 Wed Sep 16 18:05:10 BST 2009 META-INF/
    71 Wed Sep 16 18:05:10 BST 2009 META-INF/MANIFEST.MF
Yep, src JARs are a TODO. Currently an empty, dummy src JAR is used. Patches are always welcome.
creator: markt@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text: A new snapshot has been uploaded that includes src JARs.
